scriptLines: join1PRODUCT derive(InventorymanagementID = concatWS('_', concatWS('_', concatWS('_', toString(goInventoryLevel@PRODUCT_NUMBER), toString(INVENTORY_YEAR)), toString(INVENTORY_MONTH)),"GO"),
SalesorderID = concatWS('_', concatWS('_', toString(ORDER_DETAIL_CODE), toString(PRODUCT_NUMBER)), toString(QUANTITY))) ~> EmployeelKey
